Name: Monster Girl Fantasy 2: Exposed
About the game: The girls from Monster Girl Fantasy are back and they have brought new friends with them! But there's trouble in the paradise. Some of the girls have gone missing and there is a mysterious demon trying to suck their sexual energy. Will you be able to rescue the monster girls and protect them? Who will stand by your side, when everything is laid bare? Key Features No Random Encounters! Will you sneak past your enemies or fight your way through? The choice is yours! Surprise your enemies! Ambush your enemies by attacking them from behind. But be careful not to leave your own back vulnerable... Exotic fantasy world filled with unique creatures and monster girls! Wide variety of weapons and spells to help you dispatch your enemies! Full enjoyable experience in native English!
